exceptions.exn: In environment a : nat -> R l : R H : filterlim (sum_n a) eventually (locally l) The term "H" has type "filterlim (sum_n a) eventually (locally l)" while it is expected to have type "is_lim_seq ?u ?l".

In environment H0 : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_lim_seq u l -> Lim_seq u = l a : nat -> R l : R H : filterlim (sum_n a) eventually (locally l) Unable to unify "l" with "real (Lim_seq (sum_n a))".

original: intros. unfold is_series, Series in H. unfold is_series in H. unfold Series. rewrite (is_lim_seq_unique _ _ H). reflexivity.
